review: Just trust me on this one- this is NO ROKU. Sure, you get it for $10-$15 cheaper than a Roku, but with a Roku, you can browse content using just the remote. The Chromecast requires a phone or table to browse and navigate the content. Sure, most people HAVE a smartphone, but that's just another thing to waste energy. I own 3 Rokus and 1 Chromecast, and the Chromecast gets used almost never. Just about everything it can do, the Roku can do too. And more.
author: JDK
